lines.i: Factors predictive of need for trauma center care

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.53"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11158)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11383)/@code="67496-0" Other injury risk factors NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10114)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:11382), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet InjuryRiskFactor 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:10115)
NEMSIS Trace: EInjury.04
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11158)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11383)/@code="67496-0" Other injury risk factors NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10114)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:11382), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet InjuryRiskFactor 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:10115)
NEMSIS Trace: EInjury.04
